snippet.title: The Donnerwald Experiment - Chapter 3 Trailer: Dream is Expanding
snippet.description:
Update: Chapter 3 will be delayed to Q1 2022, as I want to take my time to polish up the release with a higher than usual quality.

The next chapter is approaching and it's not looking good for Johanna. Expect more info about the update soon!

The Game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/705770/The_Donnerwald_Experiment/

Our Discord Server: https://discord.com/invite/0g1JnNq1JKqI3Lp8
